name: places/ChIJrfYWzSlZwokRUbunDHNMdcs
formattedAddress: 235 E 81st St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 235 E 81st St, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: I recently visited for a pedicure with callus treatment. Patricia did my pedicure. It’s the best I’ve had so far! The space is beautiful, clean, zen, calm and cozy. Patricia transformed my feet to absolute beauty. She was nice, gentle and knowledgeable. Will definitely visit again

text.text: I recently visited for a pedicure with callus treatment. Patricia did my pedicure. It’s the best I’ve had so far! The space is beautiful, clean, zen, calm and cozy. Patricia transformed my feet to absolute beauty. She was nice, gentle and knowledgeable. Will definitely visit again

originalText.text: Cute, tiny spot with super friendly staff, can make appointments online. So happy with how my manicure turned out, and I’ll definitely be returning!

text.text: Cute, tiny spot with super friendly staff, can make appointments online. So happy with how my manicure turned out, and I’ll definitely be returning!

originalText.text: Super Clean, friendly, professional and relaxing spot.  The quality of the products is amazing, dazzle dry is non toxic and since I started to come here - three years ago- my nails have gotten stronger.  Their mani and pedi lasts for up to 3 weeks.  I don’t have a favorite technician as they are all really good and kind. For a service that lasts up to three weeks and doesn’t damage your nails, their prices are very reasonable.

text.text: Super Clean, friendly, professional and relaxing spot. originalText.text: Very clean place and professional staff. Got my nails done and they were done beautifully. The ladies there are skilled and they use high quality supplies. The price isn't too much, either. I don't get to have my nails done often but I'd get them done here again!

text.text: Very clean place and professional staff. Got my nails done and they were done beautifully. The ladies there are skilled and they use high quality supplies. The price isn't too much, either. I don't get to have my nails done often but I'd get them done here again!

originalText.text: I tried out the dazzle dry “gel alternative” and this is how my nails came out. I was getting my nails done for a wedding and work event and was embarrassed to be in public with this manicure. They chipped within hours and dried unevenly. After two days every single nail was chipped. Worst manicure I’ve received in my life. When I asked to either be refunded or have the manicure redone, I was told over email it would be no issue. When I arrived for my “appointment” the employees questioned the validity of my photos and were reluctant to help me. I’ve only had this issue at a salon once in my life and was quickly met with kind service and fixing the manicure. It was clear the tech wanted to apply a new coat as quickly as possible and get me out of there. The nail tech removed my “gel alternative” with ease and the alcohol pads used dried out my nails and skin. She did nothing to my nails but take off the polish and quickly apply a new coat. My cuticles are dried out from the alcohol and she didn’t clean up my nails at all. Afterwards I spent time trying to cleanup the leftover polish from my cuticles and area surrounding my nails. The worst service and technique I’ve ever experienced. Even after a reapply I’m embarrassed to have this manicure seen at a professional event this weekend.
